meanings.sent1: The coaliest rock in the mine was almost black.
meanings.sent2: The sky turned coaliest as the sun set behind the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The coaliest cat in the litter always seemed to be napping.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like the coaliest gemstone in the jewelry store.
meanings.sent5: The coaliest night of the year was when the stars shone the brightest.

meanings.sent1: This coaliest coal is darker than the one we used yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The coaliest cloud in the sky signaled an incoming storm.
meanings.sent3: The coaliest shoe in the store was the one everyone wanted to try on.
meanings.sent4: His voice was as smooth as the coaliest velvet.
meanings.sent5: The coaliest moment of the play was when the hero saved the day.
